name: Baha's Bigger Blaster
description: Baha's Bigger Blaster is a Legendary Gearbox shotgun from Borderlands 1 Enhanced Edition. It is a full-auto shotgun built for sustained trigger-hold fire, trading tighter pellet grouping for a wider spread while still reaching a bit farther than most shotguns.

special.red: Giving you a leg up on the competition!
special.description: Full-auto shotgun with increased damage and reduced recoil, but broader spread; it also has extended shotgun range.
